location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'View of Al Bilad fort from the south, Samhan hills in the background, a mosque in front.'

physicalDescription.extent: 1 b&w photographic print, pasted into volume

Dimensions:100 x 125 mmFormat:Black and white photographic print pasted into volume.Condition:Fading and small creases throughout. One long crease right of centre from upper to lower edge.Process:Gelatin silver print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterThe image, on folio 51r, shows a 'view of Al Bilad fort from the south, Samhan hills in the background, a mosque in front'. Ruins are clearly visible in the fore- and middleground.Inscriptions:Below image, in red ink: 'View of Al Bilad fort from the south, Samhan hills in the background, a mosque in front.'
